members.name: authoredOn

constantValues: For draft requests, indicates the date of initial creation. For requests with other statuses, indicates the date of activation.

members.name: groupIdentifier

constantValues: A shared identifier common to all requests that were authorized more or less simultaneously by a single author, representing the identifier of the requisition, prescription or similar form.
